thread.section_title: CustomUSB Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CustomUSB | customusb.com | 3 of 20
thread.title: Sue N.

author: Sue N.
title: Sue N.
text: I recently made my first purchase of custom USB drives for my business from CustomUSB. I was so pleased when I received a note from the company that they wondered if I had made a mistake on my logo because of the white space in the background. They were proactive and had already removed the white in the background. I recently received my USB drives and love them! Thank you for great quality and wonderful customer service.
